attributes.action: Cap FA Cup Final ticket prices.
attributes.background: The most expensive tickets for the the 2018 FA Cup Final are £145, a rise of more than 80 per cent on the same seat for the semi-final. This will price out the average working class fan, is excessive and arbitrary and the FA needs to be held to account.

rejection.details:
You could contact the FA about this: 
http://www.thefa.com/about-football-association/contact-us
